remarks: A one-to-one mapping induces a one-to-one mapping on power sets.  This version of ~ f1opw avoids the Axiom of Replacement.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
f1opw2.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : A -1-1-onto-> B ) $.
f1opw2.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " a ) e. _V ) $.
f1opw2.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( F " b ) e. _V ) $.
f1opw2 $p |- ( ph -> ( b e. ~P A |-> ( F " b ) ) : ~P A -1-1-onto-> ~P B ) $.
$d A a b $.
$d B a b $.
$d F a b $.
$d a b ph $.
